summary: Generate webforms in n8n and pass their responses to the workflow.

parameters.name: form path
parameters.description: The final segment of the form's URL, both for test and production.

parameters.name: form title
parameters.description: Shown at the top of the form.

parameters.name: form description
parameters.description: Shown underneath the Form Title. Can be used to prompt the user on how to complete the form. Accepts HTML.

parameters.name: form elements
parameters.description: List of form elements to include in the webform.

parameters.name: respond when
parameters.description: When to respond to the form submission.

parameters.formDescription: We'll get back to you soon
